body:
So I was making a custom edit of the faithful pack, because I like the textures, but I was making more HD items. So I decided to make a 256x256 sword. To start with, I used a photo for it, and thos was the result:

Why is the side half see through? is it because the pixels were translucent?
So I tried making my own sword, and got this:

There is still these weird lines on the edge...is that normal?
Thanks

title: Texture Pack help

replies.body:
I have never tried making a texture pack before, but from previous experiences in my graphic design, these are normally smudges or extra lines that you may have forgotten to delete/erase. 

That or these are transparent, showing nothing.
replies.body_tagged:
I have never tried making a texture pack before, but from previous experiences in my graphic design, these are normally smudges or extra lines that you may have forgotten to delete/erase. 

That or these are transparent, showing nothing.

replies.body: Yeah They Look Really Small I Think But Love THe Sword I Use The Faith Full Texture PAck
replies.body_tagged: Yeah They Look Really Small I Think But Love THe Sword I Use The Faith Full Texture PAck

replies.body:
Any res above 256 i think, its hard to monitor where the lines will appear. Most RP makers leave them becuase it is a hassle to get them out. Yes its normal...

Oh and for the black sword, you are probably using an out-dated texture pack, Im guessing your on 1.8 as well :P
replies.body_tagged:
Any res above 256 i think, its hard to monitor where the lines will appear. Most RP makers leave them becuase it is a hassle to get them out. Yes its normal...

Oh and for the black sword, you are probably using an out-dated texture pack, Im guessing your on 1.8 as well :P

replies.body: Its likely that there are extra pixels yew didnt notice when creating the sword, if you want to get rid of it yew will have to erase the extra pixels :/
replies.body_tagged: Its likely that there are extra pixels yew didnt notice when creating the sword, if you want to get rid of it yew will have to erase the extra pixels :/
